property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Thomas Gianni

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bob Eggleton

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves." - Sisay, journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rogério Vilela

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rebecca Guay

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the rest of us got paid to serve the Benalish army, the militia didn't. I used to say they stood for freedom - free and dumb." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zina Saunders

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We often bury our pasts, and then someone comes along and digs them up." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Roger Raupp

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Artist
property.value: D. Alexander Gregory

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite part of getting into the infantry was getting out again." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Frazier

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We called them ‘armored lightning.'" - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zina Saunders

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself - right now" - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I killed him because I had to," Starke lied to Gerrard. "But now I pledge my loyalty to you."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seaborne ships have their dolphins to dance in their wakes; I have my duskriders." - Sisay, journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cecil Fernando

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire." - "Hymn of Angelfire"

property.name: Artist
property.value: D. Alexander Gregory

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A double-edged sword lets you cut down your enemies with the backswing as well." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fighting without an army is called a duel, and you'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Heather Hudson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can kill your enemy with the first stroke, you save yourself the labor of the second." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Gary Leach

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Archers, ballistae - you can't even get near the island of Avenant." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep - Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Save me from Maraxus," Starke pleaded, "or condemn me to his wrath. Either way, do not ignore me"

property.name: Artist
property.value: D. Alexander Gregory

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to enchanted creature this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Charles Gillespie

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Being the best usually means proving it to everyone." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Frazier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mistmoon Griffin dies, exile Mistmoon Griffin, then return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Artist
property.value: David A. Cherry

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}. Creatures can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise." - Sisay, journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Donato Giancola

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Revered Unicorn leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of age counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I felt unworthy even to dream of it." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Artist
property.value: David A. Cherry

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think of me as the storm before the calm." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rebecca Guay

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sidar who raised me had a saying: ‘The first step into death is the hardest.'" - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Coulthart

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look to the south; there you will find peace and serenity." - The Book of Tal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Douglas Shuler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices the creature they control with the highest mana value unless they pay that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest, that player chooses one.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm always a little leery of anyone who offers to kill other people for free." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Abduction enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Colin MacNeil

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a blue permanent. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri's hackles rose as Ertai continued expounding his virtues. "If that arrogant brat doesn't shut up soon," she growled to herself, "I'm going to have to kill him."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ted Naifeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Ancestral Knowledge enters the battlefield, look at the top ten cards of your library, then exile any number of them and put the rest back on top of your library in any order. When Ancestral Knowledge leaves the battlefield, shuffle your library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Colin MacNeil

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random. If the player does, untap that creature.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Phil Foglio

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Artist
property.value: Roger Raupp

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Maybe we can trap them with bait," thought Tahngarth, eyeing Squee.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paolo Parente

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As elusive as the footprint of a djinn - Suq'Ata expression

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mike Dringenberg

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oh, I'm sorry - did I break your concentration?

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adam Rex

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves the battlefield, mill three cards. {U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kipling West

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every spell has the potential to be worthless." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Richard Kane Ferguson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jon J. Muth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part." - Sisay, journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bryan Talbot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manta Ray can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Manta Ray can't be blocked except by blue creatures. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Manta Ray.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Una Fricker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merfolk Traders enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As much as I hate water, I do love fish . . . ." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Noble Benefactor dies, each player may search their library for a card and put that card into their hand. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all cards from your library. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barrin always said that reality is relative. ‘The world,' he cautioned, ‘is but pieces of one's perception.'" - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As insubstantial - and as insistent - as appetite.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Andrew Robinson

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Illusion Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fishtails infest the water, and mists walk the land. Give me simple solid rock any day." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But you said ‘when goats fly'" Squee whined.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Una Fricker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep - Draw a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tolaria floats upon a wheel of fortune." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Luke

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zina Saunders

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The owl asks but never answers.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mark Poole

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?" - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When another creature enters the battlefield, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sneezed, and it bolted." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mike Dringenberg

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many have been lost just in staring at its wings. What's seen differs from account to account, but madness is always part of the story.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mark Harrison

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me - and with music." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bryan Talbot

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the fishtails' threats of magic didn't move me, they set their pet on us." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Stuart Griffin

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Merfolk Wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{U}, {T}: Target creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Torahn gore these shifty fishtails You can't even get close to one." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mark Tedin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mike Dringenberg

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Barrow Ghoul unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They killed my family to deny me a future. They fed on my ancestors to deny me a past." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bryan Talbot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bone Dancer attacks and isn't blocked, you may put the top creature card of defending player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. If you do, Bone Dancer assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott Kirschner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it worse to walk while dead, or to be buried alive? I have witnessed both." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Horton

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You may discard Circling Vultures any time you could cast an instant. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Circling Vultures unless you exile the top creature card of your graveyard.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Una Fricker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/-1. Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serpentine locks shape ornate rocks.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Darbury Stenderu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Smith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?" - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: George Pratt

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. {B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: It deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Thomas Gianni

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Phyrexian Horror

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Cumulative upkeep - Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If its skin looks like stone, it is only to match its heart." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Carl Critchlow

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am condemned without end." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Gary Leach

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lifespans are measured by its dreadful length.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Clint Langley

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Phyrexian Horror

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cumulative upkeep - Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Carl Critchlow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Necratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The necratog can always dig up a meal.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bryan Talbot

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Whenever Odylic Wraith deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ian Miller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Horton

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking +lt;I+gt;(Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You lose X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the Weatherlight. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Gary Leach

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile the top three black cards of your graveyard rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Coulthart

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Patrick Kochakji

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Because I am incapable of tears does not mean I have no need to shed them." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Coulthart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Gary Leach

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a nonblack, nonland permanent, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you be a stalker's dream." - Urborg curse

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your draw step, destroy each creature with mana value equal to the number of age counters on Wave of Terror. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea of fear has endless depths.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Smith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top creature card of your graveyard: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen." - Crovax

property.name: Artist
property.value: Patrick Kochakji

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't get there from here. Well, you can - it just won't be fun." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Sacrifice an untapped creature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice enchanted creature: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Clint Langley

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here." - Squee, goblin cabin hand, scouting report

property.name: Artist
property.value: Tom Wänerstrand

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Elemental Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your father has no horns Your mother wears a bell You drink the milk of goats - Talruum taunts

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cliff Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The giant wept tears of embers for the deaths of his allies." - Azeworai, "The Lonely Giant"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rogério Vilela

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Easy. All ya gotta do is push somebody into it." - Squee, goblin cabin hand, scouting report

property.name: Artist
property.value: Randy Gallegos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mine is not the warmth of compassion." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a source you control and flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Dwarf Berserker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dwarven Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I may be small, but I can kick your butt."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Douglas Shuler

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Dwarf Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kipling West

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands" - Maraxus of Keld

property.name: Artist
property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target." Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Firestorm deals X damage to each of X targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glok loved storms He'd sit an' watch an' laugh through the whole thing. I miss him." - Squee, goblin cabin hand

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Artist
property.value: Douglas Shuler

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a fuse counter on Goblin Bomb. If you lose the flip, remove a fuse counter from Goblin Bomb. Remove five fuse counters from Goblin Bomb and sacrifice it: It deals 20 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For once, Squee realized, he wasn't the dumb one.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Frazier

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Goblin Rogue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When a player doesn't pay Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep, Heart of Bogardan deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus 2.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, destroy each creature that blocked or was blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stroke of heat or stroke of blade. Choose your fate, traitor." - Maraxus of Keld, to Starke

property.name: Artist
property.value: Andrew Robinson

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Minotaur Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hurloon Shaman dies, each player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe it when they say they're connected to the land - looks like somebody plowed her face." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott M. Fischer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What cats bury, dogs eat. - Urborg aphorism

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve White

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature or Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They say lava conquers all.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott Kirschner

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Maraxus of Keld's power and toughness are each equal to the number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have no master. I am chaos." - Maraxus of Keld

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adrian Smith

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orcish Settlers: Destroy X target lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They wouldn't know their house from a charred hole in the ground.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roc Hatchling enters the battlefield with four shell counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling. As long as Roc Hatchling has no shell counters on it, it gets +3/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Una Fricker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sawtooth Ogre blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dylan Martens

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Elemental Horse

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hooves strike lightning and the thunder follows quickly after.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Bob Eggleton

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep - Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight banked sharply as the colossal beast rose up to crush the lone rider. "My bet's on the dirt," Gerrard said flatly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Arctic Wolves enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter where we cat warriors go in the world, those stupid slobberers find us." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve White

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Barishi dies, exile Barishi, then shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ted Naifeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I place this wreath for you, my kin. Even in death, you give me strength to avenge you." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Durfee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In all its forms, the forest is the elves' best protector.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott Kirschner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thinking of dinner made Squee realize that the forest was probably thinking the same thing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step. X target attacking creatures become blocked. Choking Vines deals 1 damage to each of those creatures. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ted Naifeh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too." - Squee, goblin cabin hand

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alan Rabinowitz

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. Sacrifice Downdraft: It deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fallow Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wurm's wake - Elvish expression meaning "ruined crops"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Stephen L. Walsh

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather fight on foreign soil. That way, if I lose I can blame it on the terrain." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jeff Miracola

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fungus Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Activate only if Fungus Elemental entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I rot growth and grow rot. What am I? - Elvish riddle

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott M. Fischer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.value: Rebecca Guay

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Harvest Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wurm's weave - Elvish expression meaning "plowed fields"

property.value: Stephen L. Walsh

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Liege of the Hollows dies, each player may pay any amount of mana. Then each player creates a number of 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens equal to the amount of mana they paid this way.

property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.value: Hannibal King

property.value: Elf Druid

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This forest means more to the druids than their own kin. The loss of a tree is like the loss of a child." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest has as many eyes as leaves." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.value: Douglas Shuler

property.value: Enchant creature {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring follows winter - Elvish expression meaning "all things pass"

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.value: "The bear is never cautious - which is why it wasn't born a human." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Uktabi efreet and I have something in common: both of our mothers wanted to give us back." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.value: "After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.value: Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This device was commisioned by a king who desired peace. Unfortunately, the royal artificer was also the king's jester." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator
